entry.title: Thursday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this afternoon with flurries at times heavy. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 40%
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending late this evening then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
